snippet.title: Hop For The Best - Kickstarter Demo Available Now!
snippet.description:
Download the free demo at
https://splashfirestudios.itch.io/hopforthebestdemo

Follow The kickstarter (Launches July 1st)
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/splashfirestudios/hop-for-the-best-a-clay-styled-frog-platformer


Hop For The Best is an indie clay-style platformer game in which you play as Forgy, an adorable little frog chasing hope for a better life.

Sprint, roll, climb, dash, and hop through beautiful clay inspired worlds. With no way to attack and danger at every turn, all you can do is… 

Hop For The Best!


Follow On Twitter
https://twitter.com/splashfiregames

Website
https://www.splashfirestudios.com/hop-for-the-best

Press Kit
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/13eqw2vduI1uWyIOE4RAcH-pN5a__LmGl
